title: Rich Chocolate Cake
description: A moist and decadent chocolate cake that melts in your mouth
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
Add eggs, buttermilk, coffee, oil, and vanilla. Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.
Pour batter evenly into prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then remove to wire racks to cool completely.
notes: The coffee enhances the chocolate flavor without making it taste like coffee. You can substitute with hot water if preferred.
